Junior jumper Julian Harvey punched his ticket to the NCAA Championships in Eugene Ore PERIOD after a personal best jump of  feet . inches PERIOD Harvey earned his spot at the NCAA Championships after placing ninth in the long jump at the NCAA West Preliminaries PERIOD

Mens track and field junior Julian Harvey finished his outdoor season by being selected to the second team AllAmerican at the NCAA Championships in the long jump event PERIOD

At the championships Harvey recorded a 24feet .25inch jump to take eleventh place PERIOD SIUE Interim Head Coach Scott Block said Harvey has progressed throughout the season and adjusted his outlook since the beginning of the season PERIOD

Harveys season has been fun to witness PERIOD He has matured and changed his mindset and his performances have reflected that change Block said PERIOD

Harvey qualified for NCAA West Preliminaries in the long jump triple jump and high jump and took first in the long jump at the Ohio Valley Conference meet PERIOD Also Harveys jump of  feet . inches during the Arkansas Spring Invitational was the ninthbest recorded jump in Division I athletics this season PERIOD

This is Harveys second AllAmerican performance this year earning second team AllAmerican recognition during the indoor season after placing thirteenth at the NCAA Indoor Championships in the long jump PERIOD

Along with earning a spot on the second team AllAmerican roster Harvey also broke SIUE records in the triple jump . and the high jump . during the outdoor season PERIOD
